Package org.dotplot.core.plugins

Provides the Plugin-Framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IExtentionFactory Factory interface for creating extention objects.
IJobRegistry A registry for Jobs.
IPlugin Interface as supertype for plugins.
IPluginContext<P extends IPlugin> Instances of this class are FrameworkContext for the plugin-framework.
IPluginHotSpot Supertype for hotspots of pluginservices.
IPluginListContext A Context providing a list of plugins.
IPluginRegistry<P extends IPlugin> Interface of a Registry for Plugins.
 

Class Summary
BatchJob Instances of this class are Jobs for batch-processing.
InitialiserTaskPart  
InitializerService
JobRegistry Interface of a Registry for Jobs.
PlugableService<C extends IPluginContext> Extents the AbstractService for usage in the plugin framework.
Plugin Instances of this class represent plugins.
PluginContext<P extends IPlugin> Default implementation of the IPluinContext interface.
PluginHotSpot Default implementaion of the IPluginHotSpot interface.
PluginIntegrationService Instances of this class are Services to integrate Plugins into the PluginContext.
PluginIntegrationTaskPart This TaskPart integrates Plugins into a PluginContext.
PluginJarFile Instances of this class represents Jar files of pluins.
PluginLoadingService  
PluginLoadingTaskPart  
PluginRegistry<P extends IPlugin> A Regstry for Plugins.
Version  
VersionPattern  
 

Exception Summary
MalformedVersionException Exeption to indicate a malformed Version
PluginException  
 

Package org.dotplot.core.plugins Description

Provides the Plugin-Framework.
